modName: Osilian The Awesome and his great adventures
summary: Ever thought how a game save would turn out if it was run like a game of chinese whispers
descriptionHtml:
OSILIAN THE AWESOME

the idea is a game save that will be passed on from player to player, each player records a video of there experience using a new adventure mod (Quest, new lands, new enemies, etc.) along with a weapon mod to use during the adventure along with an armor mod. then the player sends me the video and the game save through some freesource website, i then upload the video and game save for the next player to continue on for, in the end i\'d hope we\'d get a video series of mod videos.

If your interested comment and i\'ll start a list, or if your not up for making a video upload an image of your adventure

Episode 1: Chuckmccaw
Episode 2: -
Episode 3: -
Episode 4: -
Episode 5: -

Mods done so far:
Scievener07\'s alternative start mod


advised mods:
Imp\'s more complex needs - would add to the whole adventure experience
Camping mod - same idea


Instalation:
unzip the save, and place it in the game save folder, My Games/Skyrim/Saves
author: Chuckmccaw
